chunk:
Jane Iredale Face Moisturizer

Brand: Jane Iredale

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER, COCONUT ALKANES, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, JOJOBA ESTERS, GLYCERYL STEARATE, STEARIC ACID, GLYCERIN, RAPHANUS SATIVUS (RADISH) ROOT EXTRACT, ROSA CENTIFOLIA EXTRACT, ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIPS) FRUIT EXTRACT, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) BUTTER, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), ISOSTEARYL

GLYCERIN, RAPHANUS SATIVUS (RADISH) ROOT EXTRACT, ROSA CENTIFOLIA EXTRACT, ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIPS) FRUIT EXTRACT, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) BUTTER, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), ISOSTEARYL NEOPENTANOATE, EUPHRASIA OFFICINALIS (EYEBRIGHT) EXTRACT, PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT EXTRACT, RUBUS FRUTICOSUS (BLACKBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, HELIANTHUS

BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), ISOSTEARYL NEOPENTANOATE, EUPHRASIA OFFICINALIS (EYEBRIGHT) EXTRACT, PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT EXTRACT, RUBUS FRUTICOSUS (BLACKBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) OIL, CYMBOPOGON FLEXUOSUS (LEMON GRASS) OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS

FRUTICOSUS (BLACKBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) OIL, CYMBOPOGON FLEXUOSUS (LEMON GRASS) OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, XANTHAN GUM, CHONDRUS CRISPUS (CARRAGEENAN) EXTRACT, ROSA ALBA FLOWER EXTRACT, LONICERA CAPRIFOLIUM (HONEYSUCKLE) FLOWER EXTRACT

(LEMON GRASS) OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, XANTHAN GUM, CHONDRUS CRISPUS (CARRAGEENAN) EXTRACT, ROSA ALBA FLOWER EXTRACT, LONICERA CAPRIFOLIUM (HONEYSUCKLE) FLOWER EXTRACT (AND) SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
